title: Beaconcha.in Monitoring: network_peers_connected reports 0
body:
## Description

Since Lighthouse 2.1.0 "network_peers_connected" reports 0 peers to beaconcha.in's monitoring via app.

## Version

2.1.0

## Present Behaviour

network_peers_connected is 0

## Expected Behaviour

network_peers_connected should report the number of connected peers.

## Steps to resolve

Enable beaconcha.in monitoring via --monitoring-endpoint https://beaconcha.in/api/v1/client/metrics?apikey={aikey}



Recent reported network_peers_connected stats to beaconcha.in with client & version information

```
 client_name | client_version | network_peers_connected 
-------------+----------------+-------------------------
 lighthouse  | 2.1.0          |                       0
 prysm       | v2.0.5         |                      46
```

Hey @manuelsc we renamed the peer count metric in the previous release. 

Thanks for bringing this to our attention :)
